text: (gentle music)
- I'm In√®s.

I'm working with the data
center security team.
Our role is to protect the people,
the data, and the assets.
(gentle music continues)
To be honest, at the beginning

I was afraid to not having
enough experience to apply.
So she told me that it was all okay,
that I just needed to try.
So I try and it paid off. (chuckles)

The most exciting part
of the job, I think,
it's to working with the team,

'cause there is a lot of
people coming from everywhere
and you can learn from them.

And also because there is a
lot of information to know,

there isn't a week where I
don't learn something new.
So this is very exciting.
(upbeat music)

Equity, diversity, inclusion
is very important for Amazon,
and not only for the big company,

because in Amazon we have
the BEN affinity group,
so this is the Black Employee Network,

and now in France we also
have our little group.

So it means that it's still
growing and it's very important
for all of the employees.
I joined this kind of group

because it is important
to be part of something,

and to feel like, "Okay,
I'm a young Black lady
and I'm coming from France,
but also I have some origin,"
and it's good to be part of something,
like you feel it's bigger than you.
(upbeat music continues)
